title: Episode 27 - Mark Capicotto from Glamour Kills
itunes:title: Episode 27 - Mark Capicotto from Glamour Kills
description:
Today we speak with Mark Capicotto from Glamour Kills (a popular clothing company from New York) about the beginnings of his business, his introduction to independent music and why he stares at shirts in public. Brought to you by Propertyofzack.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
